##Question 4
```{r}
ggplot(Iris.dt, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Sepal.Width, color=Species)) +
  geom_point()+
ggtitle("Correlation b/w Sepal Length and Sepal Width")+
   ylab("Sepal Width")+
  xlab("Sepal Length")
```
